title: Neem Face Mist
excerpt: A cooling antimicrobial mist for breakout-prone, oily, and inflamed skin.
content:
## What Is Neem Face Mist?
A refreshing, antimicrobial skin mist formulated with neem infusion, aloe vera juice, and rose hydrosol for cooling, clarifying, and reviving breakout-prone skin.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Neem is deeply cleansing and Pitta-balancing; aloe soothes irritation, while rose cools inflammation and redness.

### Key Benefits
- Helps reduce acne-causing bacteria.
- Calms red, irritated skin.
- Hydrates lightly without clogging pores.
- Ideal for hot climates and oily skin types.

## Ingredients
- Neem leaf infusion
- Aloe vera juice
- Rose hydrosol
- Natural preservative (for water-based formula)

## Usage Instructions
- Spray on face after cleansing or anytime skin needs refreshment.
- Can be used under makeup or as a midday skin reset.

## Packaging
- Fine-mist spray bottle for even, soothing application.

## Safety & Consultation
- Patch test before first use.
- Consult dermatologist for severe or cystic acne.

## Why Choose This Mist?
A pure, plant-based clarifying tonic ideal for oily, acne-prone, or overheated skin.
